turns.text: I guess um Im going to school while Im working at I so theres not whole lot of time that Ive got uh for hobbies it seems like lately But one of the things that I do when Ive got some spare time is I do some woodworking And that oh I guess ranges anywhere from uh carpentry work to um um some types of furniture and um oh I dont know what you would call them knickknacks I guess stuff you hang on the wall to put mirror on and I made some um candle sconces that you hang on the -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah I have quite few of those that my uncle made
turns.label: b

turns.text: Theres something about working with wood that that I enjoy that - I dont know if its the saw dust or the mess you make or the smell of the wood but -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: As you know I think its more like the mess you make isnt it You dont have to worry about cleaning it up
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yeah because its its out there You know I dont have to worry about getting stuff on the carpet except when I track in saw dust and the wife gets kind of aggravated about that but then I get the opportunity to vacuum so I guess I get some of both What are some of your things you like to do
turns.label: aa

turns.text: Well when I have time I do like to sew um I had been doing lot of crocheting I make lot of afghans or used to make lot of them
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah
turns.label: b

turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh yeah
turns.label: b

turns.text: So lot of times Id help her with that I havent had much opportunity to work on any other craft stuff lately weve been trying to start up business and then trying to get my garden going
